creator: Talking Baby
descriptionHtml:
Pet Mania is the theme of pets game, the completion of the pets with their qualifying! Bring you fresh and excellent challenges!
Matching pet to collect over many different cute pets. Well come to amazing pet mania game!
Switch and match specific pet as many as you can to stop and defeat the greedy red dragon and its evil friend.
With Pet Mania you can experience a variety of quests, brilliant special effects and powerful combination of skills will definitely make you to experience the hearty pleasure!
Pet Mania is completely free to play, have fun and enjoy the game !


╮(╯▽╰)╭ --- Highlighted Features --- ╮(╯▽╰)╭
★ Over 100 fantastic levels
★ A sweet and exciting match-3 adventure challenged with cute pets
★ Beat red dragon and evil monster.
★ Brilliant special effects and excellent power-up and combos will show every level.
★ Match specific animal as many as you can to stop and defeat the greedy red dragon and its evil friend.
★ New views of the global world, hundreds of well-designed free levels! All the levels waiting for you explore.
★ Race your Facebook friends across the world!
★ All new cool map and 3D characters


╮(╯▽╰)╭ --- How to Play --- ╮(╯▽╰)╭
★ Switch and match animals in group of three, think twice before every move!
★ Beat tough levels with the help of powerful magic boosters.
★ Passing every stage with a high score and get extra gold coins, which can purchase additional conditions, will be a powerful boost when you are having difficulty.
descriptionShort: Pet Mania is the theme of pets game!
